name: Mud (itch)
description:
Content warning: trauma, failure, gender dysphoria, vague.

Muddled together in a handful of hours.

A game by Carmilla Ryder (@CarmillaRyder).

Made for Flatgame ANNUAL 2016.

Currently available on Browser, Windows & Mac.

Updates to follow.

CONTROLS:

A&D or horizontal Arrow keys to Move

(Alt+F4 to Quit if played from application)
